Present, Future Giving                                          Home / Events / MSA: Imam Nawai's 40 Hadith class                         Events                                                             MSA: Imam Nawai's 40 Hadith class                      Repeats every 7 days every Wednesday until Wed Apr 23 2014 . Wednesday, April 2, 2014 - 6:00pm - 8:00pm EDT                             Location: Rh217              Contact: eboard@polymsa.org                   Join the School of Engineering's Muslim Students Association (MSA) as they gather to host a class on the 40 Hadiths in order to educate the public regarding the different ways to enrich personal Islamic knowledge.     FREE EVENT. NO RSVP REQUIRED.
